definition: Charlie Chaplin (1899-1977), English movie actor and director
to leave/to depart/to separate/to distinguish/to classify/other/another/don't ...!/to pin/to stick (sth) in
to make sb change their ways, opinions etc
woods/forest/CL:片[pian4]/circle(s) (i.e. specific group of people)/a collection (of similar things)

sentences.english: He turned his toes out like Chaplin.
sentences.chinese: 他像卓别林那样把脚尖向外撇。

sentences.english: She is a Chaplin nut ：She's seen all his films.
sentences.chinese: 她是卓别林的癖好者，凡他演的电影都看过。

sentences.english: Charlie Chaplin once won third prize in a Charlie Chaplin look-alike contest.
sentences.chinese: 在卓别林模仿秀中，查理卓别林本人获得了第三名。

sentences.english: Charlie Chaplin once won third prize in a Charlie Chaplin look-alike contest.
sentences.chinese: 在卓别林模仿秀中，查理卓别林本人获得了第三名。

sentences.english: Chaplin his childhood in the playground and itinerant troupes busk or odd jobs.
sentences.chinese: 卓别林，他的童年，在操场上和巡回剧团卖艺或零工。
查理卓别林被封为了爵士。

sentences.english: Addicted Chaplin star gets three years for new drugs lapse.
sentences.chinese: 已经无药可救的迷恋明星卓别林有三年之久。

sentences.english: Christmas Eve, 1977 came and the house was brimming with children and grandchildren.
sentences.chinese: 1977年圣诞节除夕夜，卓别林家里子孙满堂。

sentences.english: John: The most recent addition is a statue of film star and director Charlie Chaplin.
sentences.chinese: 还有最新增添的戏剧演员和导演卓别林的雕像。

sentences.english: This little man, who is both naive and shrewd, has a("chaplinesque" side to him.
sentences.chinese: 那个小男人，既土气又精明，很有一种卓别林的味道。

sentences.english: Chaplins family life has undergone many changes.
sentences.chinese: 卓别林的家庭生活经历了许多变化。

sentences.english: Even Chaplin wondered if it would work.
sentences.chinese: 甚至卓别林都担心这事能不能成。

sentences.english: Martin Chaplin, a chemist at London South Bank University, agrees.
sentences.chinese: 伦敦南岸大学的化学家得马丁卓别林表示赞同。
他们对卓别林的表演大为赞扬。

sentences.english: The movie shows Chaplin bringing down a German Zeppelin aircraft.
sentences.chinese: 这部电影展示了卓别林击落了一架德国齐柏林飞艇。

sentences.english: The development of films with sound became a problem for Chaplin.
sentences.chinese: 对卓别林来说，有声电影的发展成了一个难题。
